Package com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer

Class SessionGameCheckPacket

java.lang.Object
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.Packet
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.ServerPacket
com.cs309.quoridorApp.dataPackets.toServer.SessionGameCheckPacket
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddFriendPacket, ChangeSettingsPacket, CheckFriendRequestsPacket, CheckFriendsPacket, GetBoardPacket, GetChatPacket, GetPlayersPacket, GetSettingsPacket, GetStatePacket, JoinLobbyPacket, KickPlayerPacket, LeaveLobbyPacket, MovePlayerPacket, NewGamePacket, PlaceWallPacket, SendMessagePacket, StartGamePacket
public abstract class SessionGameCheckPacket extends ServerPacket
Is an abstract sub-packet used to quickly check common sub-packet requirements, which are toggled in their constructor. Replaces execute() with afterCheck() as method required to be overridden; automatically returns failure if toggled requirements are not met.
